page.pageDescription: This site serves as a resume and portfolio.

content.title: Daniel Varvara
text: I'm a conscientious and highly motivated individual to better myself everyday.

card.title: Empathy in communication
card.description: I'm a very big fan of sciences and mostly psychology and neuroscience and not just because they hold amazing personal developing tools but also because i think they are crucial in an ever growing and interconnected society. I'm proud to say that it has made my working environment a place to enjoy with others which has brought me only benefits professionally and personally.
